description: I apply Fastape and Megaloc to the shower arm threads. 4 to 5 revolutions of tape and thread sealant to fill the valleys make this leak-free. Then I use Knipex's pliers wrench with a rag or plastic jaw protectors to tighten the shower head. Don't forget, when you join our Video Library today you'll get our Beginner Walk-In Shower Plumbing Course for free at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Install and NOT Scratch Black Shower Heads - #shorts #homerepairtutor
